name: Rafael's Cycle Devices
description: Master the elements of time and weather with Rafael's Cycle Devices! This mod introduces two powerful tools: the Weather Cycle Device and the Time Cycle Device. Seamlessly control the weather or shift between day and night with ease. Perfect for adventurers, builders, and time-travel enthusiasts, these devices let you shape the world to your liking. With intuitive functionality and cooldown mechanics, you'll always have the power of the cycles at your fingertips!
